item.title: Air quality & the COVID-19 crisis in NJ
item.description: Introduction Since my last post, I have seen some articles in the media discussing the link between COVID-19 and air quality. Being that I work for the Bureau of Air Monitoring, I felt like it would only be right to perform my own analysis on the vast amount of data we collect. If youâ€™d like to read over some of the above mentioned articles you can find them at the following links:
